## Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) and the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) issued this Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for the inspection, repair, and parts purchasing services for General Motors commercial vehicles located in Québec, Québec, Canada. The services will be provided as detailed in Annex – Statement of Work. Response to this RFSO must be submitted electronically.
